description.value:
An alchemist can harvest magical reagents from plants, animals, and monsters. The tools include a variety of instruments such as clippers, mortar and pestle, and pouches and vials used to create remedies and potions.

  • Skill Advantage: An alchemist has advantage on checks involving potions or magical mixtures, including but not limited to some &reference[arcana], &reference[nature], and &reference[religion] checks.

  • Craft: An alchemist can craft one of the following over a long rest:

    • Throwing Vials: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbagAcid0000000]{Acid} (x3), @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-magic-items.Item.b5QqyU0bCXTdv8qg]{Liquid Fire} (x3), @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-equipment.Item.GJ2Y6dxmMU4lWtlO]{Oil} (x3).

    • Potions: @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-magic-items.Item.QU0pSE0n7ZlS59e5]{Antitoxin}.

    • Misc: @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-equipment.Item.Dd0ioufIZp6BlUik]{Bottle of Ink}, @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-equipment.Item.1cT6XuhF1P8aJc5V]{Component Pouch}, @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-equipment.Item.wSZv7acCXyWUGlng]{Paper} (10 Sheets), @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-equipment.Item.RlrBNFXSNQ4V0Rfd]{Perfume} (x3), @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-equipment.Item.9DJLw91NSGGNoM9B]{Sack}.
